column4: Tesla to drop some color options for cars to simplify production
column5: Tesla Inc  will eliminate some color options for its electric cars to streamline production  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk tweeted on Tuesday  as the company intensifies its efforts to ramp up production. | Video

column4: Musk says Tesla to drop some color options for cars to simplify production
column5: Sept 11 Tesla Inc will eliminate some color options for its electric cars to streamline production  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk tweeted on Tuesday  as the company intensifies its efforts to ramp up production.

column4: NXP shares drop after executives outline post-Qualcomm path
column5: Shares of Dutch chipmaker NXP Semiconductors  fell 4.4 percent on Tuesday after executives outlined their strategy after the collapse this year of a proposed merger with Qualcomm Inc  but said they did not expect to raise gross margins to the level of rivals like Intel Corp .

column4: NXP shares drop after executives outline post-Qualcomm path
column5: Sept 11 Shares of Dutch chipmaker NXP Semiconductors fell 4.4 percent on Tuesday after executives outlined their strategy after the collapse this year of a proposed merger with Qualcomm Inc but said they did not expect to raise gross margins to the level of rivals like Intel Corp.
